title: Billions Club Live with The Weeknd: A Concert Film
overview: In this first-ever Billions Club Live concert film, The Weeknd delivers an unforgettable one-night-only performance, celebrating his record-breaking 25 tracks with over 1 billion streams each on Spotify — more than any other artist. Captured in stunning detail, the film features electrifying performances of his greatest hits, offering fans a front-row seat to this historic milestone. This iconic event is a celebration of The Weeknd’s unparalleled career and deep connection to music fans worldwide.
